params._account: is the address to deposit the funds for

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._account: is the address to submit the reservation for
params._reservation: is the Reservation struct containing details of the reservation

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

depositOnDemand(address).notice: This function is called to deposit funds for on demand payment

getOnDemandTotalDeposit(address).notice: Fetches the current total on demand balance of an account

getOnDemandTotalDeposits(address[]).notice: Fetches the current total on demand balances for a set of accounts

getReservation(address).notice: Fetches the current reservation for an account

getReservations(address[]).notice: Fetches the current reservations for a set of accounts

globalSymbolsPerPeriod().notice: maximum number of symbols to disperse per second network-wide for on-demand payments (applied to only ETH and EIGEN)

lastPriceUpdateTime().notice: timestamp of the last price update

minNumSymbols().notice: minimum chargeable size for on-demand payments

onDemandPayments(address).notice: mapping from user address to current on-demand payment

priceUpdateCooldown().notice: cooldown period before the price can be updated again

reservations(address).notice: mapping from user address to current reservation

setReservation(address,(uint64,uint64,ui.notice: This function is called by EigenDA governance to store reservations
